block.p: Mr. and Mrs. John L. Gillespie of Hanover, N.H., have announced the engagement of their daughter, Laura Langdon Gillespie, to Christopher Lynn Demarest, a son of Shirley Demarest of Reston, Va., and the late Robert Demarest. A September wedding is planned.
Miss Gillespie, 27 years old, is a travel representative with the Raymond & Whitcomb Company in New York. She graduated from Dartmouth College, where her father is the director of the Parents Fund.

Mr. and Mrs. John L. Gillespie of Hanover, N.H., have announced the engagement of their daughter, Laura Langdon Gillespie, to Christopher Lynn Demarest, a son of Shirley Demarest of Reston, Va., and the late Robert Demarest. A September wedding is planned.
Miss Gillespie, 27 years old, is a travel representative with the Raymond & Whitcomb Company in New York. She graduated from Dartmouth College, where her father is the director of the Parents Fund.
Mr. Demarest, 40, writes and illustrates children's books and has illustrated for other publications. He graduated from the University of Massachusetts.
